name: Book Escape
description:
You get sucked into a world of books. You need to escape by finding powerful rings that can give you the energy to transport you out of there.

Controls:

Use the A and D buttons on the Keyboard to move Left and Right

This game was made during ZenoJam 6

Assets Used:

- Character Sprite was modified by me based on a sprite made by Buch on OpenGameArt

Link: https://opengameart.org/users/buch

- Boost Platform sprite was made by ashishlko11 on OpenGameArt

Link: https://opengameart.org/users/ashishlko11

- Paper sprite made by me

- Portal sprite was made by rrcaseyr on OpenGameArt

Link: https://opengameart.org/users/rrcaseyr

- Book sprite was made by Gökhan Solak (hansolo) on OpenGameArt

Link: https://opengameart.org/users/hansolo

- Level 1 Background was based on graphing paper 

- Level 2 Background was made by Paulina Riva (PauR) on OpenGameArt

Link: https://opengameart.org/users/paur

- Level 3 Background was made by Pixabay on Pexels

Link: https://www.pexels.com/photo/flock-of-birds-flying-over-bare-tree-overlooking-su...

- Level 4 Background was made by Hristo Fidanov on Pexels

Link: https://www.pexels.com/photo/milky-way-galaxy-during-nighttime-1252890/

Sound effects were made by me using Bfxr
